Question: Osama bin Laden would later cite this person's withdrawal of forces as a sign of American weakness.
Hints: In 1985, this person visited a German military cemetery in Bitburg to lay a wreath with West German Chancellor Helmut Kohl.
This person believed that God had spared his life so that he might go on to fulfill a greater purpose.
Despite an unsuccessful attempt to recall him in 1968, this person was re-elected in 1970, defeating "Big Daddy" Jesse Unruh.
